Title: Parallel fabrication of wafer-scale plasmonic metamaterials for nano-optics
Source: Proc SPIE Int Soc Opt Eng
Abstract: © 2015 SPIE.We describe how physical vapor deposition coupled with micelle-nanolithography-seeded substrates permits the growth of metamaterials with 3D structural and material control at the nanoscale. Novel plasmonic hybrid structures with tuned optical response from the UV to the near IR are demonstrated.
